projectGridLines.title: Recurring Revenue Platform
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The debt marketplace helping new age startups to raise non-dilutive capital digitally. The platform offers zero touch onboarding, AI backed credit underwriting, investor platform

Skill sets: Programming proficiency in Java, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, MySQL

Traits expectation: Programming, SQL concepts

Expected learning: The intern is expected to have learning as a developer and at the end of internship can operate at the capacity of software developer.

Specific courses required for project execution: Core Java, OOPs, Computer System Architecture

projectGridLines.title: AICA financing platform
projectGridLines.description:
Description: AI-Enabled Credit Assessment Platform that leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence to revolutionize the way creditworthiness is evaluated. This innovative solution reduces the risk, accelerates the decision-making process, and extends credit access to the underserved market.

Skill sets: Programming proficiency in Java, ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, MySQL

Traits expectation: Programming, SQL concepts

Expected learning: The intern is expected to have learning as a developer and at the end of internship can operate at the capacity of software developer.

Specific courses required for project execution: Core Java, OOPs, Computer System Architecture

projectGridLines.title: Data Quality Engineering
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Data pipelines and engineering is the core platform to enable credit underwriting and matchmaking on Recur and AICA platform. 

Skill sets: Python, AWS, Mysql, MongoDB

Traits expectation: Programming, SQL concepts

Expected learning: The intern is expected to have learning as a developer and at the end of internship can operate at the capacity of software developer.

Specific courses required for project execution: Python, Computer System Architecture
